chats.question: Task List
chats.answer:
1. Fix all the data in notes db (format changed)
  * Fixed notes format and some data
2. Fix index, make section more on left and chats under it to right
  * added style classes and left margins for section and chat
  * made reader page look a bit better (smaller title, theme btn and file picker) 
3. Fix index, add indexTitle string for index in data
  * added indexTitle to data in server, editor and reader
4. Big refactor, types need to be shared among server, reader and editor, lib is needed.
5. Add created and last edited timestamp and show them in Notes and Reader
6. Rename db folder
